statements: DELETE FROM driver_performance WHERE driving_score > 80 AND safety_rating < 0.5;
DELETE FROM driver_performance WHERE safety_rating < 4 AND driving_score > 80;
DELETE FROM safety_metrics WHERE alcohol_test = TRUE;
DELETE FROM driver_performance WHERE driver_id = 1 AND total_accidents > 3;
DELETE FROM safety_metrics WHERE speed_limit_violations >= 5 AND alcohol_test = TRUE;
DELETE FROM metrics WHERE speed > 100 AND distance_traveled < 50.00
DELETE FROM drivers WHERE id = 10 AND active = FALSE
DELETE FROM drivers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
